title.rendered: Top-floor Downtown condo with water views

content.rendered:
Top-floor, luxury condo with water views & private deck – this is a new era of fine Portland living! This premier unit at Hobson’s Landing is move-in ready for your next Maine adventures. Chef’s kitchen features handsome navy cabinets & quartz counters, Jenn-Air appliances with gas range, and an island that anchors the space.

 

Oversized windows surround the living & dining rooms, where you can relax by the gas fireplace or watch the ships sail by. Two en-suite bedrooms offer privacy for you & your guests. There’s comfort & convenience in urban living with the impressive list of building amenities on site. A reserved, garage parking space is included, as well as a fitness center, gracious lobby with concierge, secure package room, dog wash station, and private storage
